name: SOLGOL Crypto Horizon T-Shirt
description: Embrace the future with our signature Crypto Horizon T-shirt. This premium cotton blend features a gradient design inspired by blockchain technology, with the SOLGOL logo prominently displayed. Perfect for crypto enthusiasts and sports betting fans alike.

name: SOLGOL Digital Realm Hoodie
description: Stay warm while showcasing your crypto passion with our Digital Realm Hoodie. Featuring a sleek black base with purple and light blue accents, this hoodie represents the digital frontier where sports and blockchain converge.
features: Kangaroo pocket with hidden phone compartment

name: SOLGOL Blockchain Cap
description: Top off your look with our Blockchain Cap, featuring a minimalist design with the SOLGOL logo. The purple and light blue embroidery on a black base creates a striking contrast that's sure to turn heads.

name: SOLGOL Crypto Voyager Backpack
description: Carry your essentials in style with our Crypto Voyager Backpack. Designed with the modern crypto enthusiast in mind, this backpack features multiple compartments, including a padded laptop sleeve and hidden RFID-protected pocket for your hardware wallet.
features: Adjustable shoulder straps with breathable padding

name: SOLGOL Quantum Water Bottle
description: Stay hydrated with our Quantum Water Bottle. This vacuum-insulated bottle keeps your drinks cold for 24 hours or hot for 12 hours. The sleek design features the SOLGOL logo and a gradient finish inspired by digital landscapes.

name: SOLGOL Crypto Revolution Poster
description: Decorate your space with our Crypto Revolution Poster. This high-quality print features a futuristic design that combines elements of blockchain technology, sports, and the digital frontier. The purple, black, and light blue color scheme perfectly represents the SOLGOL brand.

name: SOLGOL Digital Dawn Mug
description: Start your day with our Digital Dawn Mug. This ceramic mug features a heat-reactive coating that reveals a hidden blockchain pattern when filled with hot liquid. The perfect gift for the crypto enthusiast in your life.

name: SOLGOL Crypto Winter Beanie
description: Brave the crypto winter with our stylish beanie. Made from a soft acrylic blend, this beanie features the SOLGOL logo embroidered in our signature purple and light blue colors against a black background.
features: Ribbed construction for a snug fit

name: SOLGOL Blockchain Phone Case
description: Protect your phone with our Blockchain Phone Case. Featuring a sleek design with the SOLGOL logo and a subtle blockchain pattern, this case offers both style and protection for your device.
features: Raised edges to protect screen and camera

name: SOLGOL Crypto Socks
description: Complete your look with our Crypto Socks. These comfortable socks feature a blockchain-inspired pattern and the SOLGOL logo. Made from a blend of cotton and elastane for the perfect fit.

name: SOLGOL Crypto Key Chain
description: Keep your keys organized with our Crypto Key Chain. This metal key chain features the SOLGOL logo and a unique blockchain-inspired design. The perfect small gift for crypto enthusiasts.

name: SOLGOL Crypto Journal
description: Document your crypto journey with our Crypto Journal. This hardcover notebook features 192 pages of premium paper, a ribbon bookmark, and an elastic closure. The cover showcases the SOLGOL logo against a sleek black background with purple and light blue accents.
features: 192 pages (96 sheets) of 100 GSM acid-free paper
